'''''Amon Hen'' 221''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[January]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen221.jpg|Túrin Turambar]]''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Announcements
* AGM Announcement
* Seminar Announcements/Call for Papers
** By: Ian Collier
* Advertisement: Moreton-in-Marsh exhibition
* Advertisement: [[Parma Eldalamberon 18]]
* Advertisement: Modena congress
* Advertisement: Tolkien Thing 2010
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Rath Dínen: "The Yak" & Dorine Ratulangie
* [[Celeborn]]'s Conundrum
** By: Jordan Stewart
* Poem: ''Christmas with the [[Balrogs|Balrog]]''
** By: Sue Wookey
* Artwork: ''Balrog hanging up his wings''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* The First Awakening
** By: Susan Frances Edwards ~ Tuilinde
* Artwork: ''Troll Sat Alone''
** By: Nick Done
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|ITF]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards ~ Tuilinde
* Artwork: ''Conversation with Treebeard''
** By: Jef Murray
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Review: ''[[Tolkien's View: Windows into His World|Tolkien's View]]''
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Review: ''The One Ring'' game
** By: Jude Wells
* Review: ''[[Born of Hope]]''
** By: Jordan Stewart

* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]

* New Members
* Member Profile
